title: The Wolves of Sahlam
description: In a Universe of infinite space, A girl travels by raft amongst the stars. Star Sailor is a series of episodic short stories about a girl named Najima Dezetoiles, and her travels by raft throughout a galaxy once rocked by a terrible war.In this episode, we meet Najima Dezetoiles, eager for adventure, as she travels to the backwater world of Sahlam II. But when a strange creature are seen lurking around a small fishing town, Najima shows the townspeople her true colours.
author: Chris   Fox
